forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun. High 17C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny this afternoon. High 63F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear early followed by mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear early then increasing cloudiness after midnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 19C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 67F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 58F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 19C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 69F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High near 20C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 68F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 55F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 57F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 57F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening, then clouds lingering overnight. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 18C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 64F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning will give way to cloudy skies and light rain during the afternoon. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by some light rain later in the day. High 64F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
